standards.description: HTML i.e. HyperText Markup Language is a markup language for designing and making web pages which are inturn displayed in a web browser.
CSS i.e. cascading style sheets is a language to add style sheets to describe the presentation of a document.
SVG i.e. Scalable Vector Graphics is a vector image format which is used for interactivity and animation.
Javascript is a programming language that is used to make webpages interactive. It is used both at the client side and the server side.
XML i.e. Extensible Markup Language is a markup language that is in both machine as well as human readible format by using a predefined set of rules.
